description: Try our easy to follow Cauliflower Crust Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cauliflower pizza crust,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Soy free,Kale,Chicken,Cauliflower,Easter,Peanut free
name: Cauliflower Crust Pizza Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 free range chicken breasts, poached, shredded

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the cauliflower rice, flour, egg, yoghurt, parmesan, oregano, and garlic. Mix until it comes together to form a dough. Turn out onto a floured surface, adding more flour if it’s too sticky. Separate dough into 3 balls, then roll into circular pizza bases and place on separate non-stick baking trays. Transfer to oven and cook for 15 minutes.

Toss chopped kale with lemon juice to make it tender. Spread passata evenly with the back of a spoon across the top of each base. Top bases evenly with kale, chicken and cheese. Return to oven for a further 10 minutes until the cheese is melted and starting to colour. Remove pizzas from oven and top with fresh basil leaves to serve.
